name: Loki the Deceiver

skills.name: Flames of Mischief
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. 70% chance to extend the duration of all debuffs on each target by 1 turn.
skills.notes: Excellent for keeping debuffs up in Hydra and waves.

skills.name: Deceiver's Gambit
skills.description: Custom targeting: On enemy, places Block Active Skills and Block Debuffs, then spreads 2 random debuffs to all enemies if under Veil. On ally, heals based on Loki's HP and spreads 2 random buffs to all allies.
skills.notes: Powerful for controlling mythics and supporting team. Only 2 random buffs/debuffs are spread.

skills.name: Bandit Flash
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Steals all buffs and turn meter from the target. If under Veil, also ignores RES for these effects and grants Increase ATK to all allies.
skills.notes: No ACC required for steal if under Veil. Great for boss control.

skills.name: Mist Step
skills.description: [Passive Effect] 15% chance to Evade incoming skills and effects. If under Veil or Perfect Veil, chance increases to 30%. [Active Effect] May prevent instant death from a single ability (testing required).
skills.notes: Evade is boosted by Veil. May block lethal hits.

forms.aura: Increases Ally SPD in all Battles by 20%.
forms.comments: Mythic login/event champion. Excels at debuff extension, buff/debuff spread, and boss control. Veil synergy is key.

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: AI may not always target optimally for spread skills. Manual play recommended for Hydra and bosses.

mechanics_advisory: Best used for debuff extension and control. Veil synergy is critical for full kit value. Build for high speed and accuracy.
